bill.summary: 7/14/1988--Introduced. Amends the Export-Import Bank Act of 1945 to require the Export-Import Bank to authorize the free transferability by the originating lenders or their transferees of medium- and long-term obligations insured or guaranteed by the Bank before the enactment of the Export-Import Bank Amendments of 1986 (October 15, 1986) (currently after enactment of such Act).
